channel.title: Cointelegraph.com News
channel.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest news and analyses on the future of money.

item.title: BREAKING: White House reportedly supports only minor changes to crypto tax proposal
item.dc:creator: Samuel Haig
item.description: The crypto community is rallying against an amendment to the U.S. infrastructure plan that would maintain strict reporting requirements for developers and valid...

item.title: Boomer brand changes NYSE ticker from 'ETH', acknowledging crypto’s ascendancy
item.dc:creator: Brian Quarmby
item.description: New York Stock Exchange (NYSE) listed company Ethan Allen Interiors Inc. has changed its ticker from “ETH” to “ETD” to avoid confusion with Ethereum.

item.title: Vitalik: ‘More confident about the merge’ following ETH’s successful London upgrade
item.dc:creator: Martin Young
item.description: The London upgrade has been a success, and now eyes are on the even more eagerly awaited merge with Eth 2.0

item.title: Ethereum network burns $395K ETH per hour after London upgrade
item.dc:creator: Martin Young
item.description: At current burn rates, 2.3 ETH per minute, or $6,600 is going up in smoke.

item.title: Crypto Mom: True decentralization is the only thing that will save DeFi projects
item.dc:creator: Samuel Haig
item.description: SEC Commissioner Pierce believes that DeFi founders’ only hope to bypass financial regulation is to ensure full decentralization from launch.
